DOC.brief_summary: Preoxygenation optimize oxygen content functional residual capacity ( FRC ) . Adequate preoxygenation define expiratory oxygen fraction ( FEO2 ) > 90 % . Inspiratory support positive end expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) create good reservoir , improve gas exchange shorten time need adequate preoxygenation . The goal study evaluate efficacy tolerability different level inspiratory support positive end expiratory pressure preoxygenation healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Inspiratory Support Improves Preoxygenation Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: We conduct double blind prospective randomize trial 20 healthy volunteer . Each subject go three mode preoxygenation random order : normal breathing ( SP ) , breathe inspiratory support 4 cmH2O/PEEP 4 cmH2O ( PSM-4 ) inspiratory support 6 cmH2O /PEEP 4 cmH2O ( PSM-6 ) . Each mode last 3 min parameter record every 10 s. We evaluate subject 's tolerance , leak easiness mode preoxygenation accord simplify ( 1 4 ) scale . Two-way ANOVA use compare FEO2 simple ANOVA use time reach FEO2=90 % .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Aged 20 40 year Body mass index > 30 Mustache , beard Claustrophobia
